title: Innocent Dirty Talks
description: A gather of affairs and personal experiences will leave you divided on whether you should sympathize with them or not. Jun Waidan relates real events around love, sex and tears in a manga format. Each chapter tells a different story someone wanted to share./n/Jun Waidan YouTube channel with short films from some chapters - https://www.youtube.com/c/junwaidan/n/Volume 1 - https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4065267277
author: Tagawa Tomata

1.title: If one day, somehow, we could meet again, I'll be happy to be your beloved lover one more time

2.title: Sorry, but I'm putting up a strong front again
